description: A React component named ProductCard that displays product details including image placeholder, name, description, price, volume, and an add-to-cart button with quantity selector.

methods.name: ProductCard({ product })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a product card with add to cart functionality.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Async function that invokes the add method from CartContext to add the product with specified quantity to the cart.
